articles.title: Gaikwad drops 1st reaction after being named India's captain for Asian Games - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Opener Ruturaj Gaikwad will be leading a second-string Indian side at the Hangzhou Asian Games. | Cricket
articles.content: Opener Ruturaj Gaikwad will lead a young Indian side in the Hangzhou Asian Games as the Board of Control for Cricket In India (BCCI) has picked a second-string team for the mens cricket competition. … [+2565 chars]

articles.title: Imran Khan Reveals Plan If His Political Party Gets Banned In Pakistan - NDTV
articles.description: Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) chief Imran Khan has said in the event that his party is banned, he will float a new political party to contest the upcoming general elections and will win the elections, Dawn reported citing Nikkei Asia.
articles.content:
Imran Khan was quoted saying "even if they disqualify me and throw me in jail, the party will still win".
